 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span>] **verb** ==change== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el, etc.; [[Eccl.42.24|Eccl 42:24]] etc.; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šanû***</u></abbr>, ***change***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁנָא‎</span>, Nabataean Ethpa\`al [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>379</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, especially mentally = ***grow insane***; compare (probably) Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> ***year***, = Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שת‎</span>; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>2, 8</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שת‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šattu***</u></abbr> (compare [[BDB#M-A|Muss-Arn]]<sup>JBL xi (1892), 73 n</sup>.); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁנַא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁתָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Old Aramaic, Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנתא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנן‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>379 f.</sup>; on ***year*** from ***changing*** seasons, see Philippi<sup>ZMG xxxii (1878), 79 f.</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xll (1887), 612, 621, 636</sup> (especially against [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VIme Orient. Congr. ii. 1, 452</sup> who proposes biliteral √), compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; a daring suggestion by [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ZA vii (1892), 177</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאֹ שָׁנִיתִי‎</span> [[Mal.3.6|Mal 3:6]] I am <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***I do not change: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁנֶא‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75rr»§ 75rr</sup>) [[Lam.4.1|Lam 4:1]] how ***is*** the fine gold ***changed*** (si vera lectio; Löhr<sup>Now</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁנֵא‎</span>; gloss on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּעַס‎</span> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] Löhr); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנוֺת יְמִין עֶלְיוֺן‎</span> [[Ps.77.11|Ps 77:11]] ***the right hand of the Highest is changed*** ([[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Aq|Aq]] [[BDB#Symm|Symm]] [[BDB#Theod|Theod]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]; [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others ***years***, usually insert ***I will remember***); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺנִים‎</span> [[Esth.1.7|Esth 1:7]] ***differing, different***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, compare [[Esth.3.8|Esth 3:8]] (so [[Eccl.42.24|Eccl 42:24]]); [[Prov.24.21|Prov 24:21]] ***those who change*** (but dubious, see Toy). **Pi\`el** transitive, ***change, alter***: ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁנָּה‎</span> [[Jer.52.33|Jer 52:33]] with accusative garments, = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁנָּא‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>l.c</sup>.) [[2Kgs.25.29|2Kgs 25:29]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁנֶּה דִּין‎</span> [[Prov.31.5|Prov 31:5]] ***lest he pervert the judgment***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׁנּוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.21.14|1Sam 21:14]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׁן‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75bb»§ 75bb</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׁנֶּה‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] (and references), compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַעְמוֺ‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַעַם‎</span>, and Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šanê ‰êmi***</u></abbr>, ***madness***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׁנֶּהָ‎</span> [[Esth.2.9|Esth 2:9]], i.e. ***changed her*** place <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְטוֺב בֵּית הַנָּשִׁים‎</span>; 1 singular [[Ps.89.35|Ps 89:35]] the utterance of my lips ***I will not change*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא אֲחַלֵּל בְּרִיתִי‎</span>); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשַׁנּוֺת אֶתדַּֿרְכֵךְ‎</span> [[Jer.2.36|Jer 2:36]] i.e. change thy political course; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשַׁנּוֺתוֺ אֶתֿ טַעְמוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.34.1|Ps 34:1]] (title; compare [[1Sam.21.14|1Sam 21:14]] above); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁנֶּה פָנָיו‎</span> [[Job.14.20|Job 14:20]] ***altering his face***, i.e. in death (subject God). **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֹז פָּנָיו יְשֻׁנֶּא‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75rr»§ 75rr</sup>) [[Eccl.8.1|Eccl 8:1]], usually ***is changed***, mollified, [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׂנֵא‎</span> ***is hated*** (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹז פ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹז‎</span> **4**, √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזז‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּמִי וְהִשְׁתַּנִּית‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.2|1Kgs 14:2]] ***arise, pray, and disguise thyself.*** 



 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> **verb** ==repeat, do again== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[Eccl.42.1|Eccl 42:1]] Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bend, fold, double***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּנָא‎</span> ***repeat***, also ***teach***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šanû***</u></abbr>, especially Pi\`el ***repeat, relate***, compare Scheil<sup>ZA v (1890), 409</sup> ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]] thinks denominative); on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> as √of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַיִם‎</span> ***two***, see Philippi<sup>ZMG xxxii (1878), 77</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ib. xli (1887), 603</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁנֶה‎</span> [[1Sam.26.8|1Sam 26:8]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.34|1Kgs 18:34]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁנֶה‎</span> [[Prov.17.9|Prov 17:9]]; [[Prov.26.11|Prov 26:11]] — ***do again:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכֵּהוּוְ֗֗֗לֹא שׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]], compare [[1Sam.26.8|1Sam 26:8]] absolute [[1Kgs.18.34|1Kgs 18:34]] (twice in verse); [[Neh.13.21|Neh 13:21]] = ***speak again*** [[Job.29.22|Job 29:22]] + [[Job.40.5|Job 40:5]] according to many moderns (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁנה‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אענה‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדָבָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Prov.17.9|Prov 17:9]] ***repeat with a thing***, keep talking about it (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנות דבר‎</span> [[Eccl.42.1|Eccl 42:1]]); [[Prov.26.11|Prov 26:11]] a dullard ***repeats with*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) his folly, does it over again (learns nothing by experience). **Niph\`al** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַל הִשָּׁנוֺת הַחֲלוֺם אֶלפַּֿרְעֹה פַּעֲמָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Gen.41.32|Gen 41:32]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***concerning the dream's being repeated***, etc.
